trans-unit.source: Describes a character buffer for a text run.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 실행에 대 한 문자 버퍼에 설명합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> structure using a specified unsafe character string.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 지정 된 안전 하지 않은 문자열을 사용 하 여 구성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The caller needs unmanaged code permission in order to invoke the CharacterBufferReference method.
trans-unit.target: 호출자에 게 CharacterBufferReference 메서드를 호출 하려면 비관리 코드 권한이 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to character string.
trans-unit.target: 문자열에 대 한 포인터입니다.

trans-unit.source: The length of `unsafeCharacterString`.
trans-unit.target: 길이가 `unsafeCharacterString`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> structure using a specified character array.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 지정 된 문자 배열을 사용 하 여 구성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>배열.</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The offset to the first character to use in `characterArray`.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 첫 번째 문자를 오프셋 `characterArray`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> structure using a specified character string.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 지정된 된 문자열을 사용 하 여 구성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> containing the text characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>텍스트 문자를 포함 합니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The offset to the first character to use in `characterString`.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 첫 번째 문자를 오프셋 `characterString`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 지정된 된 개체가 같은지 여부를 결정 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재와 비교할 개체 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 obj 현재 같은지 개체; 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If obj is not a object, is returned.
trans-unit.target: If obj is not a object, is returned.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 결정 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 현재 같은지 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 현재과 비교할 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: if value is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 value 현재 같은지 개체; 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 해시 함수 역할을 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 해시 알고리즘 및 데이터 해시 테이블 같은 구조에 적합 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>현재 개체에 대 한 해시 코드를 나타내는 값입니다.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Compare two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> strings for equality.
trans-unit.target: 두 개를 비교 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 같음에 대 한 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 인스턴스의 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 을 비교 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 두 번째 인스턴스에 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 을 비교 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 같고, 그렇지 않으면 개체는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Compare two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> strings for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 두 개를 비교 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 같지 않음에 대 한 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 인스턴스의 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 을 비교 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 두 번째 인스턴스에 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> 을 비교 합니다.

trans-unit.source: to show left is equal to right; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: to show left is equal to right; otherwise, .
